Articles.Content:
Don\'t do it. Period. It\'s now a ban-able (from IRC at least) offense for both the bot and the user. As a note, if you think you can get around this we have several IRC server OP\'s and network owners in the KSP channels all the time, so don\'t try it.

-DR

this may sound dumb, but wtf is this IRC? its just one of those things ive seen over the years and I never bothered to find out what it was.

EDIT: nm, i did a quick google search, internet relay chat eh? how does a person go about finding this as I cant see nothing on ksp\'s main site about it

this may sound dumb, but wtf is this IRC? its just one of those things ive seen over the years and I never bothered to find out what it was.

EDIT: nm, i did a quick google search, internet relay chat eh? how does a person go about finding this as I cant see nothing on ksp\'s main site about it

It sometimes appears on the addon dev forums, there is also an announcement thread for it somewhere.

http://webchat.esper.net/?nick=&channels=#kspofficial to access it from your browser
wicked, thx kreuzung i\'ll check that out most definatly
What is a relay bot? I know what IRC is, but I am not up to date on it. I know a bot is a program that runs in a changel- relay sounds like redirecting content?
It\'s a bot designed to rely info from one network to another.
